author: sarah L.
review: Absolutely loved the variety in this menu! The Classic Smash Burger was a standout—juicy, flavorful, and perfectly balanced. The Loaded Fries were also a hit, especially the Spicy version with harissa and crispy onions. And don’t even get me started on the desserts—the Cookie Dough Pistachio & Kunafa was heavenly. A must-try for anyone who loves bold flavors!.

author: James T.
review: The Peri Chicken Burger was fantastic—succulent and packed with flavor. I also tried the Halloumi Salad, which was fresh and satisfying. The only downside was that the French Tacos felt a bit overpriced for the portion size. Still, overall, a great dining experience with something for everyone

author: Alice J.
review: This menu is a foodie’s dream! The Buttermilk Fried Chicken Burger was crispy and delicious, and the Frenchie Loaded Fries were the perfect comfort food. I ended the meal with the Le Croockie, which was pure indulgence. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for creative and tasty dishes.

author: Mike B.
review: The Veggie Burger was decent, but I felt it lacked a bit of flavor compared to the other options. On the bright side, the Chicken Salad was fresh and well-seasoned, and the Icy Croissant dessert was a fun and unique treat. Solid menu, but some dishes could use a little more punch

author: layla M.
review: Wow, just wow! The Halloumi Burger was incredible—grilled to perfection and paired with a sweet and spicy sauce. The Special Loaded Fries were also a highlight, with the Algerian sauce adding a unique twist. And the La Pistachio Cookie dessert? Divine. This menu is a winner in every category!
